DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics BI 1744 CL Tiotropium Bromide give fix dose combination
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Multiple Rising Inhalative Doses BI 1744 CL Fixed Dose Combination With Tiotropium Bromide Healthy Male Volunteers
